title: Physics teacher
skillsAndExperience:
- Passion for learning and teaching and be committed to raising standards 
- Up to date with current pedagogical thinking 
- Able to inspire others to ensure the delivery of high-quality learning experiences for our students 
- Fantastic subject knowledge and understand how to teach highly challenging lessons so that students can reach the top grades in the subject. 
- High expectations of themselves and others Ambitious and committed to ongoing professional development
whatSchoolOffers:
- A bespoke curriculum offering students a strong core entitlement in English, Mathematics and Science 
- A full extra-curricular programme with opportunities for enrichment activities for all 
- An excellent opportunity for continued personal development through our Talent Pathway 
- A wide range of staff benefits 
- Excellent resources and facilities 
- A wonderful community that is involved within school life.
safeguardingCommitment: This school is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people and for ensuring that they are protected from harm.

title: Teacher KS1 or KS2
skillsAndExperience:
- Passion for learning and teaching and be committed to raising standards 
- Up to date with current pedagogical thinking 
- Able to inspire others to ensure the delivery of high-quality learning experiences for our students 
- Fantastic subject knowledge and understand how to teach highly challenging lessons so that students can reach the top grades in the subject. 
- High expectations of themselves and others Ambitious and committed to ongoing professional development
whatSchoolOffers:
- A bespoke curriculum offering students a strong core entitlement in English, Mathematics and Science 
- A full extra-curricular programme with opportunities for enrichment activities for all 
- An excellent opportunity for continued personal development through our Talent Pathway 
- A wide range of staff benefits 
- Excellent resources and facilities 
- A wonderful community that is involved within school life.
safeguardingCommitment: This school is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people and for ensuring that they are protected from harm.
furtherDetailsAboutTheRole: The candidate will be required to undergo a full enhanced DBS check and must be eligible to work in the UK.

title: Teacher
schoolType: Local authority maintained school, ages 3 to 5
skillsAndExperience:
- Passion for learning and teaching and be committed to raising standards 
- Up to date with current pedagogical thinking 
- Able to inspire others to ensure the delivery of high-quality learning experiences for our students 
- Fantastic subject knowledge and understand how to teach highly challenging lessons so that students can reach the top grades in the subject. 
- High expectations of themselves and others Ambitious and committed to ongoing professional development
whatSchoolOffers:
- A bespoke curriculum offering students a strong core entitlement in English, Mathematics and Science 
- A full extra-curricular programme with opportunities for enrichment activities for all 
- An excellent opportunity for continued personal development through our Talent Pathway 
- A wide range of staff benefits 
- Excellent resources and facilities 
- A wonderful community that is involved within school life.
safeguardingCommitment: This school is committed to safeguarding and promoting the welfare of children and young people and for ensuring that they are protected from harm.
furtherDetailsAboutTheRole: The candidate will be required to undergo a full enhanced DBS check and must be eligible to work in the UK.
